title: Lend a Helping Hand
intro: Supporting someone quitting smoking can make all the difference.

tip1.heading: What Is Addiction?
tip1.body: Smoking is an addiction, not just a bad habit. These products are engineered to hook you, making quitting hard—but not impossible!

tip2.heading: Be Patient & Positive
tip2.body: Cheer them on through slip-ups and celebrate wins to keep motivation high.

tip3.heading: How You Can Help
tip3.body: There are many ways to help someone Dquit—offer advice, lend an ear, and stay non-judgmental.
